title: FS/T: T206 SGC Graded 40's & 50's ALL SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS/T: T206 SGC Graded 40's & 50's ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
I would like to expand my SGC 40 or 50 T206 HOF'er collection. I have these that I can offer for yours. Also will trade for SGC 50-60 T206 White Sox I need. My only caveat for the HOF'ers is they can't have any creases. Corner creases, rounded corners, worn backs, even a bit dirty all fine. They just can't have any creases or wrinkles in the body of the card. I don't care about what back they are, more common the better if it keeps the price down. Postage will be $3 and insurance (if you want it) $3+ depending on value purchased.

SGC 50's:
Cy Barger  Piedmont 350  SOLD
Ginger Beaumont  Piedmont 350  SOLD
Jack Quinn  SC 350  SOLD
John Titus  Sovereign 350  SOLD
SGC 40's:
Heine Wagner  Bat on Left Shoulder  SC 150 SOLD
Harry Covaleski  Piedmont 150 SOLD
Fred Snodgrass  SC 350 (Orange Variation)  $55

I need: Chesbro, Waddell (both), Jennings (all 3), Keeler (both), Willis (all 3), Wallace, Beckley, Clarke (both), Joss (pitching), McGinnity, Wheat, Marquard (all 3), McGraw (all 4), Baker, Flick & Huggins (portrait).
Thanks!
Cards now available for sale, take a look. Can do better on prices the more you buy!

Hi Tony

I'm interested in the SGC 40 Jack Dunn Lionel Carter if it is still available.

I will send you a PM with my email addy. Could I get a scan please?

Thanks

Jantz

Hi Tony,

PM sent.

Respectfully,

Dave
I'd be interested in the Tim Jordan if the pending trade falls through. Let me know - Seth

Final price reductions noted, all cards no longer listed are sold or traded.
Thanks to all participants!
Prices lowered AGAIN. Will take less than I paid just to move them out. $200 takes all 4 ppd. if anyone is interested.

$125 ppd takes them all or still for trade.
Thanks

Tony,

I'll take that SGC 50 Quinn for $55 if it is still available. Pm sent also just to make sure you get my message. Let me know

Thanks,

Jantz
